summary:
A nice medium length treasure hunt with a story/quest in it. 

PART 2 COMING SOON!
descriptionHtml:
[A sequel is in progress!]
I looked around Nexus a while back and couldn\'t find any treasure hunts with a story in it. I really like treasure hunts so I decided to make one. I hope you guys enjoy it. 

To start the Treasure Hunt, go to riverwood blacksmith. In the wheel barrow beside the steps, there will be a book. Read it. Enjoy :)

Features:
- 4 Clues to find the Final Treasure
- Story
- Nice treasure

WALKTHROUGH COMING SOON!

In the end part, make sure you take a look around the area. It may take a bit, but it\'s somewhere there. 

Thanks for downloading.
author: Paul
